content.rendered:
Davines hair products are available at Luxe Concept Salon, Chatswood. Don’t live in Sydney? No problem – we are happy to arrange postage anywhere in Australia. You can either buy Davines online via our shop – or call us to discuss the best product and arrange delivery.

Davines is a family-owned, international hair-care brand distributed in over 70 countries worldwide, guided by the principle of sustainable beauty. The brand encompasses the power of natural ingredients within their entire range, to create products that both your hair and conscience will love.

With a large collection for all hair and scalp concerns, Davines products have been scientifically engineered to deliver exceptional results, all while expressing the distinctive message of sustainable beauty. All Davines products are packaged in food-grade materials and each range contains ingredients sourced from family-owned farms across Italy. Davines delivers truly exceptional products, with the smell, look and feel taking you away to a tranquil place.

Contact Luxe to learn more about the Davines products and view the range now.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=60VMI-LUp7A&feature=youtu.be&t=17
